# Cyclist Bike-Share Analysis

## Introduction

#### This project analyzes the cyclistic bike-share data-set to determine how can cyclistic maximize the number of annual memberships by converting casual riders to members and uncovering usage patterns among casual and member users.

## PHASE 1: ASK

## Business Goal

#### How can cyclistic maximize the number of annual membership

## Data

#### The data for this analysis was sourced from the Cyclistic bike-share data provided by Motivate International Inc. It includes information on ride_id, ride able_type, start and end time, start and end station id or name, start and end lng or lat, member_casual.
